statements: SELECT * FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_text FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id IN (234, 567) ORDER BY customer_id, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%' AND rating < 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM RoboticsCustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_feedbacks > 1 ORDER BY num_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, improvement_description FROM ProductImprovements WHERE implemented = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT id, product_name FROM ProductImprovements ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_improvements FROM ProductImprovements WHERE implemented = TRUE GROUP BY product_name
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN ProductImprovements ON CustomerFeedback.customer_name = ProductImprovements.product_name
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM Products JOIN Manufacturers ON Products.manufacturer_id = Manufacturers.manufacturer_id;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE manufacturer_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM Manufacturers WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE manufacturer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM Products JOIN Manufacturers ON Products.manufacturer_id = Manufacturers.manufacturer_id;
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(*) FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Products WHERE manufacturer_id = 1);

SELECT manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name, COUNT(product_id) AS products_count FROM Manufacturers JOIN Products ON Manufacturers.manufacturer_id = Products.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_id ORDER BY products_count DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers_feedback;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text, customer_id FROM customers_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM products_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_ratings WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT improvement_description, improvement_date FROM product_improvements ORDER BY improvement_date;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM products_feedback WHERE customer_id = 3;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, rating FROM customers_feedback JOIN customer_ratings ON customers_feedback.customer_id = customer_ratings.customer_id JOIN products_feedback ON customer_ratings.product_id = products_feedback.product_id;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM customers_feedback LEFT JOIN customer_ratings ON customers_feedback.customer_id = customer_ratings.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_country FROM Manufacturers;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101 AND feedback_rating < 4;
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer_id, model_year FROM RobotModels WHERE manufacturer_id = 201 AND model_year > 2010;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_country, manufacturer_website FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_country = 'USA';
